amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike funding rescissions used as offsets from the Department of Agriculture, Department of Energy, Callable Capital Account for Multilateral Development Banks, and the Export-Import Bank.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order by the rule and printed in House Report 106-76 to strike funding rescissions used as offsets from the Department of Agriculture, Department of Energy, Callable Capital Account for Multilateral Development Banks and the Export-Import Bank.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 228 (Roll no. 68).
